GSD.product_version: versions from v4.18 to before v5.4.119
GSD.description:
powerpc/64s: Fix pte update for kernel memory on radix

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.119 by commit 73f9dccb29e4f82574bec2765c0090cdb0404301, it was introduced in version v4.18 by commit f1cb8f9beba8699dd1b4518418191499e53f7b17. For more details please see the references link.
